structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Contents of ordinance establishing a development area -- Agency to oversee and administer implementation of ordinance -- Termination date.

text.section: An ordinance establishing a development area may designate an existing agency to oversee and administer implementation of a development area ordinance or a portion thereof.
Unless the ordinance establishing a development area requires an earlier date, a development area shall cease to exist on the termination date.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 6, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 59, effective June 26, 2009. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 7, effective March 23, 2007.
